observation: The user successfully accessed the full PDF of the research article titled 'Modelling and Control of Spatial Behaviours in Multi-Agent Systems with Applications to Biology and Robotics'. The document appears to be a Ph.D. thesis by Andrea Giusti from the Università degli Studi di Napoli Federico II. The advisors listed are Prof. Mario di Bernardo, with co-advisors Prof. Diego di Bernardo and Prof. Marco Faella. The thesis aims to explore the modeling and control of spatial behaviors in multi-agent systems, with applications to biology and robotics, as indicated by the title.
